title: AllDom Packs
description: Manage your grouped domain name packs.

empty.title: No AllDom pack
empty.description: You don't have any AllDom pack yet.
empty.selectDescription: Choose an AllDom pack from the list to see its details.

terminatingWarning: This pack will be terminated on {{date}}. Non-terminated domains will be billed individually.

terminate.title: Terminate pack {{serviceName}}
terminate.subtitle: You can terminate all your services or manage them individually.
terminate.warning: You will no longer benefit from the reduced price. Non-terminated domains will be billed at the standard rate.
terminate.confirmWarning: Warning, the following services will be terminated:
terminate.noDomainsSelected: You have chosen to terminate the {{serviceName}} pack but keep your domain names.

cancelTerminate.title: Cancel termination of {{serviceName}}
cancelTerminate.subtitle: Are you sure you want to cancel the termination of {{serviceName}}?
cancelTerminate.description: The pack and its domains with automatic renewal will be restored.

domains.title: Pack domain names
domains.terminateInfo: Select domains to include in termination
domains.name: Domain name
